title: Crew Show! (Back from 24hrs of Lemons)
description:
It's a crew show! Zack is back from racing Lemons at Sebring and had all of the good and  bad one expects from racing cheap cars. Matt tells us about an amazing book about human stupidity, and we take a deeper dive on how we failed at van camping. Learn from our mistakes! 

 

Get 20% off your first monthly box when you sign up at BoxOfAwesome.com and enter the code smokingtire at checkout.


 

Go to PublicRec.com and use promo code TIRE to receive 10% off
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
